html:
4.26.18  11:44 pm   Should we separate the artist from their art?

     seems like they would be happier together but sure

4.26.18  11:44 pm   Do you like Madonna,

     sure but not that much

      and if you do what's your favorite song by her?

     i'll remember

4.26.18  11:44 pm   Do you think we fully appreciate our childhood 

     i do, do you

4.26.18  11:19 pm   dose god exist?

     sure, and more

4.26.18  11:02 pm   and the day goes on is the third or fourth song where you talk about your home.

     it's not my home necessarily, but i have used the word home in many songs, probably 30 or more songs

     do you have unresolved family issues?

4.26.18  11:01 pm   Are you aware of the amount of people who feel generally happier after listening to your music?

     approximately yes

      It confuses me when people say they're concerned that you are depressed, since I don't get that, "vibe", if you will, from your songs, or your content as a whole.

     me neither

4.26.18  10:42 pm   are you dead inside

     no

4.26.18  10:38 pm   are you the human embodiment of depression?

     no

4.26.18  10:36 pm   haven't had the time to keep up with stuff recently, what's the plan with releasing content

     release the content! (make it first, to ensure that it exists before releasing)

4.26.18  9:42 pm   Oh my lord I think I've finally figured it out! In the new song at the part "and I'm long gone, and I'm right where I belong" at the last part do you use a G#sus to an F#sus is this true

     not quite

4.26.18  9:38 pm   I really don't like the "Christianize all the Kingdoms" meme you used in hotewig. I guess I feel like a piece of the internet polluted your perfect video and now it's less pure wurtz. Do you know what I mean?

     no

4.26.18  9:36 pm   What's the song at the survey part of cool facts about bill wurtz (https://youtu.be/AxSHR6YE7-g @ 0:05)? I've been looking for ages and it seems very calming.

     'survey of facts'

4.26.18  9:29 pm   Do you ever have to play Bill Wurtz? In other words is there a certain mind set you go into when developing your media? Something like a caricature of your self?

     if that starts happening i make sure i stop and get real again

4.26.18  8:49 pm   Why don't you post on your notes page anymore?

     why don't you notice when i do

4.26.18  8:00 pm   how do you get a song unstuck from your head?

     listen to a different song more

4.26.18  7:53 pm   Does anything matter since we're all gonna die ;-;

     yes

4.26.18  7:18 pm   would you say that "and the day goes on" is, in part, a song about time?

     sure

4.26.18  6:48 pm   Do you whatever?

     it seems like i am doing it constantly

4.26.18  6:42 pm   is there some sort of hidden meaning behind your tweets that when put together will lead us to some hidden treasure or am i looking too deep into this

     the hidden treasure is the audio/visual content you can find if you go to some of my other sites/pages

4.26.18  6:14 pm   what's a good money management tip

     try putting it in different compartments

4.26.18  6:05 pm   How can I be happy?

     the answer may surprise you

4.26.18  5:45 pm   will humans ever be able to fly

     they already can

4.26.18  5:27 pm   what kind of data do you get from google analytics?

     which type of anime is trending

4.26.18  5:26 pm   how do i get interested in what my friends are doing

     how about getting friends who are interested in what you're doing

4.26.18  5:19 pm   why did my parents divorce

     because they finished their main job which was creating you

4.26.18  5:09 pm   What is your master plan for conquering the world?

     trick the world in to conquering itself. then i can take the day off, maybe get an early lunch

4.26.18  4:52 pm   What's the weirdest thing you've ever been asked on here?

     i have never been asked anything weird

4.26.18  4:42 pm   do you make commissioned work for other people?

     no

4.26.18  4:39 pm   did you show up your face in new videos ?

     sure

4.26.18  4:37 pm   do you have any tips on hating yourself less?

     try to be a better person?

4.26.18  4:22 pm   what makes you so optimistic in your songs?

     makes for a better listening experience, i think

      why not write depressing music?

     i think that would be depressing

4.26.18  4:20 pm   How many hamsters is too many?

     check the instructions! usually written on the back of the hamster

4.26.18  4:19 pm   If the Earth is flat, then whY do planets sometimes go retrograde across the sky?

     they're all flat. and they are going in a flat retrograde, it's called flatrograde

4.26.18  4:19 pm   Is the pen really mightier than the sword?

     for certain tasks, especially things like writing, etc

4.26.18  4:01 pm   How would you recommend learning to play the piano? I'd like to learn and have no previous experience

     find a piano, and spend some time experimenting, pressing the buttons (keys)

4.26.18  3:52 pm   i think they want to call it "Anthropocene" now 4.25.18  10:44 pm

     i was going to say that but i found out it has not yet been approved by the important committee

4.26.18  3:48 pm   is your real name joe tractorman?

     tractor person

4.26.18  3:48 pm   Do you intentionally try to create songs that mimic genres?

     absolutely not

      I notice "New Canaan" is very country sounding, "alphabet shuffle" is kinda soul-y. How do you decide between mimicking a genre and doing a song that's more "Wurtzian" for lack of a better term.

     i just try to make the best songs i can. this is an ongoing strategy i have

4.26.18  3:41 pm   Why are you like this?

     why are you like this

4.26.18  3:39 pm   Why don't you post on the 'reality' page as much as you used to?

     it's important to remember that most of the content there was posted on the same day (may 17, 2016). few more items were added in august, 2017. so overall nothing has changed, except for when i spent 3 months (february-may 2016) collecting, sorting, selecting, editing, and adding graphics to audio clips from an archive of thousands of hours of recordings, and piecing them together to form a coherent story, whilst also panicking that no other videos of any kind could get done for those entire 3 months

4.26.18  3:33 pm   What chords can I use to play "and the day goes on"? Am too stupid to find out.

     F#, B, and more

4.26.18  3:33 pm   How do I ride a llama 

     you must first climb the llama

4.26.18  3:23 pm   Are you a consumer 

     yes and producer

4.26.18  3:18 pm   so the pre-into for "and the day goes on" is basically just a static amp sound?

     that's not how it was made but yes

4.26.18  3:04 pm   4.25.18  11:24 pm so what are your thoughts on albums with some kind of narrative structure tied together with skits like Tommy or good kid maad city

     sounds like a bit more than an album. visual elements would be helpful there too, if not already present

4.26.18  3:00 pm   has the mountain in your song something to do with nietzsche somehow?

     yes, the person running up the mountain had recently made a tweet which happened to contain the word neitzsche, and instantly got followed by 500 nietzsche quote-bot accounts. the person is running up the mountain to get away from the nietzsche accounts

4.26.18  2:35 pm   can you say yes

     sure

4.26.18  2:30 pm   what if the day goes off?

     it goes on again

4.26.18  2:16 pm   What chords would you put after the song in 'smiling techniques' to complete the cadence?

     G7, C for example

4.26.18  2:11 pm   any tips for someone wanting to create tunes with a lot of meaning to them without using lyrics?

     no musician wants to hear this, but you are going to want to focus the music around at least some other element besides the music. whether it's words, characters, events, situations, pictures, people, stories, a game, or something else
